body.name: REGOSS 12 Inch Innerspring Hybrid Mattress, Motion Isolation Individually Pocketed Coils Mattress, Euro Top Full Size Mattress in a Box, Plush Foam Spring Mattress for Pressure Relief, Purple
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 38 mins
features: 【SAFE BOX SPRING MATTRESS】Certified by reputable organizations such as ISPA, CertiPUR-US, and Oeko-Tex Standard 100, our foam materials are free from harmful substances such as formaldehyde and heavy metals like mercury. Our 12 inch mattress fabrics are also skin-friendly, healthy, and eco-friendly, so you can enjoy a stable and restful sleep without any worries. Choose our full size mattress and rest easy knowing that your health and comfort is our top priority.

【MOTION SOLATION & PRESSURE RELIEF】Our hybrid mattress combines comfort of foam with durability of pocket innersprings for the ultimate sleeping experience. The pocket innersprings work independently to absorb over 95% of motion disturbances from your partner, ensuring a peaceful sleep. The multi-layer foam provides optimal relief and support from shoulders, back, and hips when you are lying on the full innerspring mattress, ideal for side, back or stomach sleepers, no worry of back pain.

【2 FIRMNESS & 2 USAGES】REGOSS 12 in spring mattress features a unique flippable design, allowing you to easily switch between two different sleeping feelings in one mattress. One side is for those who like sleeping with a soft and medium-firm feel; The other side is great for those who prefer a firm feeling. Simply flip the foam mattress to the side that best suits your sleeping preferences.

【MATTRESS IN A BOX & MAXIMUM WEIGHT】REGOSS full bed mattresses come in a convenient box that's vacuum-sealed for directly delivery to your door and easy setup. Simply unbox and unroll, and watch your full hybrid mattress expand to its original shape within 72 hours. With a maximum weight capacity of 500 lbs, it offers ample support and durability for a comfortable night's sleep.

【BUY WITH CONFIDENCE】Our hybrid mattresses are compatible and complementary with most frames and foundations, like Foundation, Slatted Base, Bunk Bed, Platform Bed and Adjustable Frames. We hold ourselves to a high standard of quality, and back our plush mattresses with a 10 year warranty and 30-day return policy. If you have any questions at our euro top mattress, please do not hesitate to contact us. (Please be careful not to scratch the inner item during unpacking)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WHY CHOOSE OUR INDIVIDUAL POCKET SPRING MATTRESS? SAFE TO SLEEP ON. All foam mattresses is made of skin-friendly and comfortable fabric and multi-layer high-quality foam, safe and healthy for your kids and family.HYBRID MATTRESS. With a Euro top, comfort foam and pocket springs, the layers offers pressure relief and just-right support, perfect for different sleepers.MINIMAL MOTION TRANSFER. Pocketed spring mattress reacts individually to pressure, minimizing motion transfer form your partner's tossing and turning.CUSTOMIZE SLEEP EXPERIENCE. Offers a soft and medium-firm feel on one side or a firm feel on the other. Both innovativeness and versatility.REINFORCED EDGE SUPPORT. Solve the problem of edge collapse.PIECE-OF-CAKE SETUP. Simply unpack, unroll, and voila!

CUSTOMIZED SUPPORT FOR ALL SLEEP STYLES Regardless of whether you prefer sleeping on your side, back, or stomach, REGOSS hybrid foam mattress delivers the perfect balance of medium firmness, ensuring optimal comfort, coolness, and breathability.

UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY Designed to seamlessly fit and enhance most bed frames and foundations, including Foundation, Slatted Base, Bunk Bed, Platform Bed, and adjustable frames. Enjoy the versatility of our queen spring mattress.

REGOSS Hybrid Euro Top Mattress in a Box Experience the ultimate sleep solution on our hybrid innerspring mattress with advanced multi-layer foams and integrated pocket springs. This unique combination ensures the ideal level of firmness, delivering personalized comfort that is neither too soft nor too hard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this mattress for the price it’s totally worth it! When you open the plastic surrounding the mattress, make sure you have it on the bed frame because it opens very quickly and expands right away! Has no smell which I was very concerned about. And if your partner moves on the bed at the same time as you, you don’t feel it it’s really nice, it’s comfortable it’s supportive and I like the softer side that’s just me but I still feel I have enough support so glad I have it so glad I bought it. PS it’s extremely heavy when you get it I ordered a full size. The ad says it weighs 10 pounds. It’s more like 100 pounds and it took two men to bring the box into my foyer , so make sure you have someone there to help you it’s really heavy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and good for side sleepers
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for my first apartment, wanted soft (not firm) mattress. This is perfect for side sleepers like me. I was skeptical for hybrid mattress, cause I wanted memory foam only. But this is perfect! I have lower back problems, and this mattress easily helps shaping to your form.Some review said that it didn’t puff up all the way (top foam), but after sitting for 24 hours without laying on it, mattress was able to adjust to 12in. 10/10!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Completely as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Excellent sleeper. Plush top, plenty of support. Buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Full size hybrid matress
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Glad I got the 12”. It’s not as firm as I thought it would be but it’s comfy enough that I sleep well so I’m not complaining.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ordered a 12" mattress. Opening up was easy, inflated right away but only got to 11". Overall it was a fine height. My husband states its real comfortable. I will send another review after a month

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is 2nd twin mattress I have ordered from Regoss. First one was for bed in three season porch which I sleep in the warmer months. This one is for upstairs bedroom.I especially like these features1) Using both sides depending on how you want the mattress to feel ( soft/ medium firm or flip to other - firm side )2) Handles on both sides to turn mattress around or flip to other side3) Because of these flip features I get longer use out of the mattress and my back feels better4) Inexpensive cost compared to well known brand name mattresses and coupon is usually offered on Amazon Happy I did the research and discovered this company!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's ok. It's firm, which I like but my lower back has been hurting. It's been 2 weeks and my body has not adjusted. I'll be ordering a topper

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the ease to open package. I sleept on it the first night. Had the best sleep. Takes about 3 days to fully expand. I recommend this a 5 star mattress!
